member.name: T:CoreApp.LambdaEntryPoint
member.summary:
This class extends from APIGatewayProxyFunction which contains the method FunctionHandlerAsync which is the actual Lambda function entry point. The Lambda handler field should be set to
CoreApp::CoreApp.LambdaEntryPoint::FunctionHandlerAsync

member.name: T:CoreApp.LocalEntryPoint
member.summary: The Main function can be used to run the ASP.NET Core application locally using the Kestrel webserver.
